here step by step photo tutorial here ritzy ripple blanket pattern make chains in the multiple of 14 + 2 i made 156 chs for my example blanket row 1 make 2 double_crochet into the 3rd chain from your hook *make 1 double_crochet into each of the next 3 chs double_crochet decrease over the next 3 chs double_crochet decrease over the next 3 chs make 1 double_crochet into each of the next 3 chs 3 double_crochet into the next chain 3 double_crochet into the next chain repeat from * until you have 1 chain left in this row make 3 double_crochet into that last chain to complete row 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet into 1st st *make 1 double_crochet into each of the next 3 sts double_crochet decrease over the next 3 sts double_crochet decrease over the next 3 sts make 1 double_crochet into each of the next 3 sts 3 double_crochet into the next st 3 double_crochet into the next st repeat from * until you have chs left at the end of this row make 3 double_crochet into those chs to complete repeat
